results.content: First of all I can understand the instructor. Secondly the Infinite Skills people are always well prepared, and do a wonderful job explaining the subject. The how and whys  of what's being taught.

results.content: Nice solid course. Very organized, clearly explained, good audio & the instructor cares about Sass, development, and the student's results! It's obvious the instructor has tons of real world experience - that helps too.
results.content_html: Nice solid course. Very organized, clearly explained, good audio & the instructor cares about Sass, development, and the student's results! It's obvious the instructor has tons of real world experience - that helps too.

results.content: Overall good class, setting up Sass is a little tricky at first, but once you ge tit going it is pretty cool.
results.content_html: Overall good class, setting up Sass is a little tricky at first, but once you ge tit going it is pretty cool.

results.content:
A brilliant course covering Sass, uses clear examples and covers different applications of Sass such as ruby on rails, wordpress and frameworks like foundations. I now feel confident in my understanding of Sass. The only downside is that the Project files are already completed, this makes it difficult to complete the examples. But still felt like this course worked well for what I needed to learn. 
Thank you,
